question: 鋳造
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>create</kanji> a <kanji>cast</kanji> you need to learn <vocabulary>casting</vocabulary> first. Then you can make lots of neat art, crafts, and counterfeit money. Wait, no, don't do that last one.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You've learned both of them, so you should already know this word!
